name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with extensive experience in software development, specializing in **Go**, **Java**, **C#**, and **C++**. Proficient in Linux environments and adept at working with databases such as **Postgres**. Skilled in implementing protocols and automating workflows. Strong analytical skills with a background in malware analysis and RFC implementation. 
With over 13 years of experience in full stack development, I deliver high-performance applications, particularly in the healthcare and financial industries. My tech stack includes **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with hands-on expertise in both frontend and backend frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I have built AI/ML-powered platforms supporting predictive analytics and real-time processing, and I deploy cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**. Experienced in implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines, I am well-versed in compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Additionally, I possess a strong background in MLOps, including model training, serving, and orchestration using MLflow, Airflow, and Kubeflow.
